name: Officers Mess Room
longDesc: You have just entered the Officers mess wearing prison garb.  There is a piece of hard tack on the floor next to a big fat weevil. There is a door to the East
shortDesc: Officers mess. There is a piece of hard tack on the floor.  There is a door to the East
feat1desc: small square piece of hard tack
feat1interactSuccess: You have revealed a slip of paper
feat1interactComplete: the hard tack is destroyed and a slip of paper is visible
feat1interactFail: That's not how we handle 'hard tack' here
feat2interactSuccess: the paper has a number written on it, 999
feat2interactFail: the paper has not been viewed
